text: The New York Stock Exchange (NYSE)—also sometimes called the "Big Board"— is a stock exchange in New York City. It is the biggest stock exchange in the United States by the amount of money and the second-biggest stock exchange by the number of companies listed. Its building is on Wall Street. Category:Stock exchanges in the United States Category:Buildings and structures in Manhattan Category:New York City Designated Landmarks Category:Economy of the United States
title: New York Stock Exchange
